# dcloud_vms (Data Source)

All the VMs currently in a given topology



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `topology_uid` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `vms` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--vms))
